data.title: Black Silent Film
data.meta_description: It's not easy to watch a Black silent film during Black History Month when a staggering number of silent films by, for, or about Black people have been lost. Those losses grow in magnitude when you consider that such films were relatively rare even when they were new. Take a moment to explore Black silent films from then and now.
data.meta_site_name: Academy Museum of Motion Pictures - Timeline
data.text:
WHAT YOU'LL SEE

Get an inside look at the museum's exhibitions.

Exhibition Highlight

The “Impact/Reflection” gallery will invite visitors to consider how moviemakers have investigated and explored a variety of societal issues.
